Class VastContentMediator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.upsight.android.marketing.UpsightContentMediator<VastContentModel>
      • com.upsight.android.marketing.internal.vast.VastContentMediator

  • public final class VastContentMediator
extends UpsightContentMediator<VastContentModel>
    The UpsightContentMediator that mediates Upsight VAST content.
